but im sorta liking that.

ugh. ugh. ugh.

im so agitated and irritable. my chest is all tight and i want to throw chairs at everyone and scream.


i need more cappucino and more cigs. and a nap.




fuck this shit.

so got in a huge fight with my mom. all is well now.

took a bath. yay.
got new pjs. yay.
had a nice drink and now im buzzing a little. yay.

now im going to go smoke the last cig of the night, go in my room and wrap presents, read, and go to bed.

i have a very busy day tomorrow so i will talk to you all in a couple days. hope your holidays go well.

You are Form 1, Goddess: The Creator. "And The Goddess planted the acorn of life.
She cried a single tear and shed a single drop
of blood upon the earth where she buried it.
From her blood and tear, the acorn grew into
the world." Some examples of the Goddess Form are Gaia (Greek),
Jehova (Christian), and Brahma (Indian). The Goddess is associated with the concept of
creation, the number 1, and the element of
earth. Her sign is the dawn sun. As a member of Form 1, you are a charismatic
individual and people are drawn to you.
Although sometimes you may seem emotionally
distant, you are deeply in tune with other
people's feelings and have tremendous empathy.
Sometimes you have a tendency to neglect your
own self. Goddesses are the best friends to
have because they're always willing to help.

Which Mythological Form Are You?

got nothing done today.thats okay. i was being silly and talking to jess for awhile.
now im talking to charles <333 who if i had the means id be his nurse maid. 


*yawn* getting a little sleepy now. but i wanna go find some crayons and draw and listen to bad music for awhile. heh. im so WEIRD. WIRED. WEIRD. WIRED.

yea, thatd be so cool.

and i cant miss school so i hafta go to the health clinic. meh. last time i went there they said i was fin and three days later i had pnuemonia. 


im so weak and tired. i guess i'll go throw some clean clothes on.

have a good day you healthy motherfuckers.

greatgrandpas in the hospital. again

goodnight.

flash sucks. math sucks. programming sucks. hookes law sucks.

but fuck.


gonna smoke a cig and take a shower now.

Breathe, breathe in the air. 
Don't be afraid to care. 
Leave but don't leave me. 
Look around and choose your own ground. 

Long you live and high you fly 
And smiles you'll give and tears you'll cry 
And all you touch and all you see 
Is all your life will ever be. 

Run, rabbit run. 
Dig that hole, forget the sun, 
And when at last the work is done 
Don't sit down it's time to dig another one. 

For long you live and high you fly 
But only if you ride the tide 
And balanced on the biggest wave 
You race towards an early grave.

1. What's your name: erika. all powerful meadow. 
2. What do you wish your name was, instead: uhm, im quite happy with my name thank you.
3. How are you: seventeen
4. Would you ever eat sushi?: hm. yea, i'd probably try it.
5. Would you ever eat sushi off a naked body?: er, depends on if sushi tastes good, and whose the naked body it was.
6. Have you considered homosexuality?: sure. havent we all. hell, yea. uhm. i thought i was bi for awhile. but im not.. girls can be hot, but they're annoying, and i dont like them usually. at all. plus. something about the thought of me sticking my tongue in someones cunt sorta.. i dunno. not my thing. to each their own though.
7. What's your sexual preference?: boys. like.. little boys.. ew.
8. What were you in a past life?: i dont know, but sara told me her cat sweetie was like.. a rapist in her past life. sweetie is scary.
9. I punch you. Quick, what do you do?: depending on my mood and the person's size/strength.. call you a fucking cocksucker and start beating the shit out of you.. or call you a fucking cocksucker and picking up some heavy object to beat the shit out of you.
10. When confronted with Britney Spears, you...?: shove a cucumber up her twat. i think she'd dig that. and id videotape it. and id be rich. and everyone would love me cuz hey im that girl who shoved a cucumber up britney.
11. What's your favorite coffee?: not a coffee person.
12. What's your political perspective?: make sure everyone has food and shleter (unless they are so lazy they refuse to help themselves and or they just wanna be homeless and starve) gimme my gun dont arrest me if i wanna do drugs (darwinism) and get rid of the death penalty.. and uhm.. free flowers for everyone.
13. Are you my Angel?: depends, are you my bitch?
14. Do you consider yourself a poet?: ha. no.
15. What do you wanna be when you grow up?: me.
16. There's a naked man in your living room. What do you do?: freak out. grab a knife. and politely tell him to get him and his shriveled old turkey neck outta my house.
17.How stupid do you think you are?: i can be pretty stupid. i can be pretty smart.
18. How stupid do other people think you are?: uhm. go ask them.
19. Who the hell do you think you are?: erika
20. Is the Wonderbra good or bad?: horrible! if ya got tits ya got tits. if you dont you dont. why try and fool everyone. 
22. What's your favorite fruit?: Kenny G <~ no answer will ever compare sty..
23. Can you feel the love tonight?: yea.. its called my fist up your ass.
24. On a nude beach, you would...?: probably be blushing, staring at the sane, not naked, and occsionally sneaking a peek and sexually assualting people with my dirty mind.
25. Make up a story with yourself, a bridge, and a rabbit: i found this rabbit under a bridge once. it was dead. so i gave it to a little girl and told her it was the easter bunny.
26. What do you think about contemporary art?: fuck, i dont want to answer this.
27. Do you like being naked?: not at all.
28. If we had proof god didn't exist, what would happen?: nothing. people would still believe.. or come up with some new god.
29. Do you enjoy cheeze whiz?: cheese in a can, *shudder*
30. What's your position on virginity?: uhm.. uh.. what the fuck?
31. On civil unions: jesus, just shut up.
32. On RuPaul: looks better as a woman.
33. On mosquito bites: your tits.
34. On bad sitcoms: tv rots your brain and eats your soul
35. On Fran Drescher: *whistles*
36. Are you left handed or right handed?: right.
37. Are you smart?: depends..
38. What's your middle name?: leigh
39. How many personalities do you have?: just one that i know of.
40. How many piercings do you have?: my fucking earring fell out in my sleep so now just 2 in my ears and my lip.
41. What was your first word?: (word-S): ahcoo. 
42. Are you superstitious?: yea, a little.
43. Do you read your horoscope?: occasionally
44. Do you believe in that stuff?: to a point yes. 
45. Can you do a cartwheel?: i seriously dont know. ive never tried.
46. Do you have contact lenses?: not yet.
47. Do you have a retainer or braces?: nein.
48. Can you drive?: yes.
49. Do you snore?: not usually, but sometimes if im sick.
50. Do you drool in your sleep?: haha yes! a lot. the lip ring made it a little worse too. hehe.
51. Do you lick your envelopes or use a sponge?: *wiggles tongue* oh yea baby.
52. Do you keep a journal?: mhm
53. Do you like onions?: NO.
54. Do you like cotton candy?: duh. sugar. me. yea, i love it.
5. What instruments can you play?: i bet you can play the skinflute.
56. Do you like to dance?: only when im drunk usually.
57. Do you like to sing?: mhm.
58. Are you any good at it?: i can carry a tune but im not particularly good.
59. Do you like to talk on the phone?: usually no, every once in awhile i do though.
60. Do you like where you live?: i vary between the extremes.. 
61. Are you organized?: not at all. im just a chaotic mess.
62. Do you sleep with socks on?: no, ive tried. sometimes i can, but usually it really bothers me to have socks on while im sleeping.
63. Are you shy?: very much so.
64. Do you talk to yourself?: mhm. 
65. Are you a morning person?: depends on how i woke up, how much sleep i got, etc etc
66. Are you a virgin?: sure thing.
67. Are you proud of that?: uhm.. no.. it doesnt really matter either way does it?
68. Do you believe in reincarnation?: *shrug* i dont know what i believe yet.
69. Do you believe in God?: in some.. weird.. erika way.. yea
70. Do you believe in ghosts?: yes.
71. Do you believe in bigfoot?: i believe in big hairy men roaming the woods, yes.
72. How old do you wish you were?: 16
73. What will you name your daughter?: uhm. i'll tell ya if and when i have a daughter. 
75. Have you ever thought you were gonna die?: quite a few times..
76. Where do you wanna go?: i sorta have to pee.. so i might go do that now.

i feel much better. im so cranky in the morning.

must do homework.


and sty needs to stop talking about my womb.

i hit a dog. i hit a dog. i stopped. and it ran. and i stopped at their house. we looked for it. found it. still alive. i. i cant write. i. my head is so i cant understand what im saying. i ran over a dog. it screamed. i heard it. it. i. 
im. i took some ativan. and im. going to try and sleep. or something. i dont. i. i keep hyperventilating. i. i dont know. please dear god. if there is a god. whatever the fuck there is. let it be okay. let it be okay. i. im. i have to go.

know what bothers me?

going to sleep. but your mind being so preoccupied that you're really just thinking with your eyes closed. damnit.

sitting here. falling asleep sitting up.


i wonder if any just likes me for me.



im so sleepy.

anything. i dont know. i want to say call me in a couple years when you've matured. or just fastforward. ha. fuck it.


Your Existing Situation
Is seeking a solution to existing problems or anxieties, but is liable to find it difficult to decide on a right course to follow.


Your Stress Sources
Feels unappreciated and finds the existing situation threatening. Wants personal recognition and the esteem of others to compensate for the lack of like-minded people with whom to ally herself and make herself more secure. Her sensual self-restraint makes it difficult for her to give herself, but the resulting isolation leads to the urge to surrender and merge with another. This disturbs her as she regards such instincts as weaknesses to be overcome; only by not succumbing to them, she feels, can she withstand the difficulties of the situation. Wants to be valued as a desirable associate and admired for her personal qualities.


Your Restrained Characteristics
Feels that she is receiving less than her share and that there is no one on whom she can rely for sympathy and understanding. Pent-up emotions and a certain egocentricity make her quick to take offense, but she realizes that she has to make the best of things as they are.



Your Desired Objective
Urgently in need of rest, relaxation, peace, and affectionate understanding. Feels she has been treated with a lack of consideration and is upset and agitated as a result. Regards her situation as intolerable as long as her requirements are not complied with.


Your Actual Problem
Depleted vitality has created an intolerance for any further stimulation, or demands on her resources. A feeling of powerlessness subjects her to agitation and acute distress. Tries to escape from this by relinquishing the struggle, and by finding peaceful and restful conditions in which to recuperate in an atmosphere of affection and security.


Your Actual Problem #2
Wants to be valued and respected, and seeks this from a close and peaceful association of mutual esteem.



- why are these things so damn accurate. fuckers!


im on my 5th mug of mint tea in an about an hour. mmm.

hmmph. i need to leave in 10 minutes.. and i cant find any pants i want to wear. oh geez. and i havent brushed my teeth yet. meep!

im so sleepy now. i feel a lot better, and yea. my musical tastes have changed drastically over my short years.. but these two songs, i always have, and maybe always will love. they make me laugh.

damn, i look trashy right now.

YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAY!

im about to start getting dressed. and yes, i will post pictures. i have to!

im getting all whorified right now. and then im going to jeremy's to do his makeup. oh sweet bliss. yea charles, i said whorified <3

halloween is bliss okay? dont let anyone tell you otherwise. pure fucking bliss.

just shaved my legs.. now... MAKEUP! then clothes. then hair.


i love halloween!

theres a lot to say.


but im too overwhelmed to speak.

okay, so im a chickenshit.

so maybe im thinking that i wont say anything.

but i know i will.. someday. but for now im all content just. being.

im exhausted.

night.

how much this bothers me. im trying not to cry right now.

he's dead.

meaning. not breathing, thinking, no heart beat, no blood pulsing, no chemical reactions, no. life.


im going to go paint now.

this kid that graduated from my school a while ago died. he was 21. okay, so i wasnt friends with the kid, and he sorta creeped me out. but i was reading the obituaries and i almost cried. cuz. i mean. he was middleaged at 10 and 1/2. its so fucked. its really bothering me.


fuck.

RIP 

yea, fuck. people. its not right. i dunno. and some other people i know (but dont like) got in an accident yesterday. psh. i hope this doesnt become a trend. but arund here theres never just one young person who dies, one will die, a couple weeks later someone else.

i dont know.

school is the main problem here.

so i talked to my guidance counselor and we're thinking..
1. GED (although all of us are a little wary of this one since i only have 1 more english class, PIG, and economics to go..)
2. online courses
3. uhhhhhhhhh.. yea

so we'll see. i dont know. i just want to be able to get into a college when im ready.

i know this wont work.


but does anyone not living in the upstate ny area have a couch i could crash on for a week or two?

reason # 14351458 why i dont like my life right now


my mother is a fucking guilttripping mindfucking bitch.

so now i have bright red streaks in my hair.


so what.

i fell asleep on the bus. i put another hoodie on, my two scarves, and some gloves. im wearing my new pink glasses. and a jester hat with bells. at one point i either dreamed it or someone was poking me and i half woke up and swatted at the air.

it really reminded me of fear and loathing.

is it normal that in my class i can quite loudly say things like "go to hell" "my god my teacher is a moron" "i hate you cunt" "i hate my life " and smartass comments. and no one notices. and just openly mock my teachers grammatical and common sense errors..




its sort of funny.



next time im just going to call my teacher an asshat.
i dreamed i was the hooded figure. and the tree spoke to me.

this project is due at 11:35..

its 6:18..

bad erika.


im pretty sure i'll get it done.


in other news, i feel like shit. again. damn dreams. this really needs to stop!


no party tonight so gotta make other plans. 


sometimes its downright painful being the middleman.


adieu.

i have a blood brother. so golden age childhood. i need a movie about my life.


i probably have aids now. die die die dying slowly.


cybil shepard would play me. or martin sheen.



oscar wilde would be best.
